questions.question: Why is 3D modeling important for VR experiences?

answers.a: It helps create realistic and interactive digital spaces
answers.b: It improves the resolution of VR headsets
answers.c: It reduces the cost of VR development

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of environment modeling?

answers.a: Designing a futuristic spaceship for a sci-fi game
answers.b: Creating a detailed virtual replica of a historical artifact
answers.c: Building an entire virtual city with roads, buildings, and trees

questions.question: In which of the following fields can 3D modeling be applied?
